meanings.definition: Conforming to the law or to rules.
meanings.sent1: The judge declared the document as legitimate evidence in the court case.
meanings.sent2: It is legitimate to park only in designated areas.
meanings.sent3: The legitimate use of a banana peel as a makeshift phone holder surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her legitimate concern for the environment drove her to volunteer for clean-up efforts.
meanings.sent5: The legitimate ruler of the kingdom was welcomed back with open arms by the citizens.

meanings.sent5: The legitimate decision to invest in education paid off in the long run.
